name: Human Multiplayer Game
description:
Greetings, Humans! Would you like to work together on something special? Get ready for a puzzle Experience Like no other!

HUMAN MULTIPLAYER GAME is a Puzzle game Specifically designed for humans – not Artificial intelligences – that puts real world cooperation to the test - decipher clues and decode data, collaborate and solve a Variety of challenges with others in order to progress.

You don't have to be an Expert to get the job done. You only have to be human! The objective is simple - join forces to collect the data scattered around and decode it before time runs out. No schemes or Ulterior motives here! – just good old-fashioned entertainment with no Strings attached.

Fun for everyone and nothing to worry about – except winning, of course!
